text: Transitivity may refer to: ==In grammar== * Intransitive verb * Transitive verb, when a verb takes an object * Transitivity (grammar) ==In logic and mathematics== * Transitivity (mathematics) ** Transitive relation, a binary relation in which if A is related to B and B is related to C, then A is related to C * Syllogism, a related notion in propositional logic ==Other== * Transitive Corporation, a computer software firm that developed QuickTransit
title: Transitivity
